title: Poongatru Thirumbuma Lyrics Muthal Mariyathai
stanzas:
Poongaathu thirumbuma
emmpaatta virumbumaa
paaraatta madiyil vachi
thaalaatta
enakoru thaai madi
kidaikkumaa

Raasaave varuthama
Raasaave varuthama
aagaayam surungumaa
yengaatha adha
ulagam thaangaathe
adukkumaa sooriyan
karukkumaa

enna solluven
en ullam thaangala
metha vaangunen
thookkatha vaangala

indha vedhana
yaarukkuthaan illa.
unna meerave
ooril aal illa

suga raagam sogamthaane
suga raagam sogamthaane
yaar adhu poradhu
kuyil paadalaam
than mugam kaattumaa

Poongaathu thirumbuma
emmpaatta virumbumaa
paaraatta madiyil vachi
thaalaatta
enakoru thaai madi
kidaikkumaa

ulla azhuguren
veliya sirikkiren
nall Â veshamthaan
veluthu vaanguren

maane en nenjuku
paal vaartha thene
munne en paarvaiku
vaa vaa penne

yesa paattu padichen
naane
yesa paattu padichen
naane
poongiyil yaaradhu
konjam paarunga
pen kuyil naanunga

adi neethaanaa
andha kuyil
yaar veettu sondha kuyil
aathaadi manasukulla
kaathaadi
parandhathen
ulagame marandhathen

naanthaane andha kuyil
thaanaaga vandha kuyil
aathaadi
manasukul kaathaadi
parandhadhaa
ulagamthaan marandhathaa
